Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ld \Ld.\ n. The abbreviation for {limited}, term appended to the name of a company that is organized to give its owners limited liability; also abbreviated {Ltd.} It corresponds to {Inc.} in the United States. [Chiefly British] [abbr.]
Syn: limited company, Ltd. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: Ld. n : a company that is organized to give its owners limited liability [syn: {limited company}, {Ltd.}]
